title: 711: $7 TRILLION OF CAPITAL SET TO POUR INTO BITCOIN AND CRYPTO, SAYS MACRO INVESTOR DAN TAPIERO!!!!
description:
Prominent macro investor Dan Tapiero says he believes a staggering $7 trillion is set to pour into Bitcoin (BTC) / Crypto.

“When I founded this fund, the digital asset ecosystem had a $300 billion value. And that is Bitcoin, Ethereum, all the crypto, and all the equity value in the space was about 300, and I said to myself, ‘I think we can do 30x in 10 years.’

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
